source.sqlReaderQuery: select cast(max(ld_start_dt) as date) as ld_start_dt from log_hist where table_name = 'file_load'

activities.name: If Condition1
activities.description:
1.@and(
endswith(item().name,'.zip' ),
contains(item().name,substring(variables('ld_start_dt'),0,10))
)// only zipfiles
2.@contains(item().name,substring(variables('ld_start_dt'),0,10))//anyfiles
3.@and(
startswith(item().name,'Employe'), 
endswith(item().name,'.zip' ),
contains(item().name,substring(variables('ld_start_dt'),0,10))
)// only zipfiles with starting Employee

activities.name: Copy data1
activities.description: Copying files from fusion to dwh

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ld_start_dt) ld_start_dt from log_hist where table_name = 'file_load'

scripts.text: UPDATE log_hist set ld_end_dt= SYSDATETIME() where table_name = 'file_load'

scriptLines: query: 'select employee_id as userId,concat(first_name,last_name) as title,email as body\nfrom emp where EMPLOYEE_ID is not null',
